```{r echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
template <- "%s %s (w: %s %s)"
dat.today.wide.printable <- transmute(dat.today.wide,
  current = current,
  color = color_incl_new,
  text = sprintf(template, municipality, increase_1d, increase_7d, growth)
)

table <- xtable(dat.today.wide.printable, auto = TRUE)
align(table) <- "llll"

print( table, 
  type = "html", 
  html.table.attributes = 'border=0', 
  include.colnames = FALSE, 
  include.rownames = FALSE
)
```
